channel.title: Whonix 14.0.1.1.1 Testing Results
channel.description:
Before I finished uploading the images I tested the release and found a show-stopping result:
whonix.list apt source error line 15. The repo line was mistakedly not commentted out.
I saw the live-mode indicator is now in the taskbar but the packages are not included by default. Can you please include both grub-live and ro-mode-init out of the box?
The good news is the patched apt version is included.
I will do a rebuild and announce the fixed version whenever it's ready.

item.title: Whonix 14.0.1.1.1 Testing Results
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
HulaHoop:

I saw the live-mode indicator is now in the taskbar but the packages are not included by default. Can you please include both grub-live and ro-mode-init out of the box?

No because that would install it by default for existing Whonix 14 (stable repository) users as well. Risk of regressions. Therefore targeting Whonix 15.
https://phabricator.whonix.org/T886

Read full topic
